attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Metropolitan police are sitting on hard evidence that Tony Blair should face "war crimes" charges. Evidence of these crimes were put before the press at a briefing held in the Palace of Westsminster. An MP was present and it was disclosed that this evidence had been passed to the Metropolitan police. Tony Blair is not a fit person to hold any public office until these charges are brought and answered in a court of law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
